name: Ionball 3
description: Hack programs and wipe out viruses in cyberspace. Retro arcade gameplay merged with fun new mechanics. Original synthwave score by Tim Moffet.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7 Processor: Dual core 3.2GHz or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics card supporting directX 9.0c and shader model 3.0 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: 10 Processor: Intel Core I5 2.7GHz or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 8800 or higher. ATI HD 3850 or higher. DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Any
